2.The person who has the Speciality Restaurants GV / GC Code is deemed to be the beneficiary.
3.Speciality Restaurants GV / GC cannot be clubbed with any other offer or voucher.
4.Do inform the cashier that you plan to use the GV / GC for making payments before billing.
5.Only the listed Speciality Restaurants outlets at its sole discretion accept the GV / GC. Speciality Restaurants may add or remove an outlet without giving any prior notice.
6.More than one GV / GC can be used in one bill.
7.This is a ONE time use GV / GC.
8.No Credit note / Refund for the unused amount of the GV / GC will be given.
9.Speciality Restaurants GV / GC CANNOT be revalidated once expired.
10.Speciality Restaurants GV / GC is valid only on Food & Non-Alcoholic beverages
11.Speciality Restaurants GV / GC cannot be redeemed on specific block out dates. Speciality Restaurants may add or delete any date on its sole discretion.
12.Any dispute related to the GV / GC should be referred to the issuing company and the decision of the issuing company shall be final.
13.Speciality Restaurants makes full efforts to accept Insta Gift Vouchers (GV) / Gift Card (GC), but on account of any technical / administrative reasons an outlet may refuse to accept the same.
14.If an Insta Gift Voucher (GV) /Gift Card (GC) gets blocked on account of technical issue, it would get enabled in 72 hours.
15.For any queries / issues related to GV / GC, raise a request at www.gvhelpdesk.com

Descriptions: Founded in 2000, MakeMyTrip is a pioneer in India's online travel industry. You will get the most competitive prices for booking accomodation. Get MakeMyTrip HotelGift Cards and Gift Vouchers from GyFTR at discounted prices to make hotel bookings easy and efficient.
importantInstruction:
• MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay CAN be used online at www.makemytrip.com/ android app/ iOS app or offline by calling the Holiday Experts at 0124- 4859657.
  • This is a MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay and not MakeMyTrip Gift Card. On the payment page, under ?Gift Cards, Wallets & More? Section, select the ?MakeMyTrip Gift Card? option. Select the third option ?MMT e-Pay gift card? to add the 16-digit number.
  • To know more about the redemption process visit here
  • MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay CAN only be used for HOLIDAY BOOKINGS.
  • MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay CANNOT be clubbed with ongoing offers.
  • A maximum of 3 MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay CAN be used in one transaction.

1.This is a MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card that is valid for purchases made from MakeMyTrip APP/Website for Holiday bookings only.
2.To check MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card balance & validity, please log on to - www.makemytrip.com/gift-cards/?popup=checkbalance
3.MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card can be redeemed Online at www.makemytrip.com or on MakeMyTrip Android & IOS app for Make My Trip Holidays bookings only
4.MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card is valid for partial redemption. The balance would remain in the MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card till the validity period and can be reused for multiple transactions.
5.Maximum 3 MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Cards can be combined and used in 1 booking.
6.Products and services are subject to availability.
7.This MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card cannot be redeemed Offline for Flights and Hotels.
8.This MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card is not valid on Cab, Bus, Activities, Rail, Homestays, and VISA.
9.This MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card is not valid on bookings through myBiz.
10.This MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card is not applicable to the Pay Later Payment option.
11.MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card cannot be clubbed with any other ongoing offer discount/cash back/promotion run by makemytrip.com on the app or website.
12.The MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card cannot be cancelled or exchanged for cash.
13.The MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card validity cannot be extended under any circumstances.
14.MakeMyTrip is not responsible if the MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card is lost, stolen, or used without permission.
15.In case of cancellation of bookings made using the MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card within the validity period, the amount will be reversed to the same MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card as used at the time of booking.
16.Users are required to save the MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card number to utilize this refunded amount as we will not be able to reissue a new MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card number.
17.In case of cancellations where the MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card validity has expired, no refund will be processed for the amount paid by the MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card.
18.In case of transaction failures, after MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card is applied, the amount will be automatically refunded to the same MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card within 24 hours.
19.MakeMyTrip and Gyftr is the final authority on the interpretation of these rules.
20.MakeMyTrip reserves the right to deny accepting any MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card if it suspects that cards are duplicated.
21.In no event, the liability of MakeMyTrip for any claims shall exceed the MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card's value.
22.In the event of any dispute, parties agree to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of New Delhi.
23.This is for individual use only, Travel agents found using the MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Card would lead to cancellation of booking and no refund would be made.
24.For any issue or query regarding MakeMyTrip Holiday e-Pay Gift Cards, please write to giftvouchers@makemytrip.com or www.gvhelpdesk.com

tnc:
1. This is a Malabar Diamond Gift Voucher (GV)/Gift Card (GC) and it would be accepted at Malabar Gold & Diamonds all outlets in India as well as Malabar Gold & Diamonds online Shopping portal. For the store list visit www.malabargoldanddiamonds.com/stores/india  For Online Shopping visit www.malabargoldanddiamonds.com 
2. The GV/GC can be redeemed against purchases of Diamond, Platinum, Uncut diamond Jewellery only. 
3. The person who has the GV/GC is deemed to be the beneficiary. 
4. Multiple GV/GC (maximum 9) can be used in on single bill. 
5. GV/GC cannot be exchanged for cash. 
6. No refund/replacement/compensation is permissible for unused/expired/ misused /lost /mutilated/defaced GV/GC. 
7. GV/GC cannot be clubbed with any ongoing/existing offers. 
8. Malabar Gold Ltd. shall on a best-effort basis attempt to accept GV/GC but on account of any technical reason or for any reason beyond control of Malabar Gold Ltd. GV may not get accepted on the store/website and shall have no liability for the same. 
9. If GV/GC gets blocked on account of technical issue, it will get enabled within 72 hours. In case of transaction failures, after GV/GC is applied, the amount will be automatically refunded to the same vouchers within 48 hours. 
10. GyFTR/Malabar Gold Ltd. reserves the rights to edit/change the terms and conditions for the Malabar GV/GC at any time without any notice or liability. 
11. For any queries related to GV/GC, raise a request at www.gvhelpdesk.com.
